title: Sample Document
author: John Doe
content: This is a sample document generated using JSON2Doc converter.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.text: This section demonstrates how JSON data can be mapped to document templates.

sections.heading: Features
sections.text: JSON2Doc supports various data types and nested structures for document generation.

sections.heading: Conclusion
sections.text: This example shows the power of template-based document generation.
